title: LEIF Service 1 inputs
description: This document records the outputs of the LEIF Service 1 system

Carrying out construction works.description: Carrying out construction works in the enclosing structures during the project (to increase the energy efficiency of the house)

Reconstruction of engineering systems.description: Reconstruction of engineering systems (ventilation, recuperation) to increase the energy efficiency of the house (during the project)

Water heating system.description: Installation of a new water heating system (during the project)

Heat installation.description: Installation of heat installations to ensure the production of heat from renewable energy sources
